nodes.text: Lu was a male resident of the Outer Rim planet Batuu, who was a friend of the farmer Julen Rakab during his childhood. Around 22 ABY, when Rakab was about seven years old, Lu pushed the farmer into one of the water-filled cenotes of the Black Spire Ruins. Rakab recounted the incident to the smuggler Izal Garsea when the pair visited the same cenotes about twelve years later, and reflected that Lu's actions had forced him to learn how to swim, or he would have drowned.
Lu was first mentioned in A Crash of Fate, a 2019 young-adult novel written by Zoraida Córdova.
